item.title: Talks
item.description: I consider public speaking as one of the most important parts of my knowledge sharing journey. It’s been a fear that I’ve managed to overcome. A challenge that paid off well multiple times in a form of people I’ve met, insights I’ve gathered and lessons I’ve learned. Below you can find a summary of talks I’ve been working on over the last couple of years. Front-End Tooling - Tales, Legends and Myths ğŸ“… 04.
